txt.en:
'Ah, fortunate timing, [placeholder]. You look like a capable adventurer.

'People here could use your help if you are willing. A group of brigands nearby in Zikrum-dûl has been preying on the weak as they flee the demons in the area.

'It is a step too far for them to be attacking and robbing folk who are trying to escape this cursed land. They must be stopped if you find yourself in the area.'
Return to Dilûsu now that you have made the area safer from the brigands.
Dilûsu has asked you to help him deal with another group of brigands nearby that have been attacking people trying to flee.
'I have reports that the fiends in Zikrum-dûl have been dealt with. I trust I have you to thank for that, [placeholder].\n\n'This road will now be safer for people in need... for now, that is.'
Dilûsu has asked you to help him deal with a group of brigands near Zikrum-dûl who have been attacking people as they flee the Orcs.
